siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: At Trafikito you can monitor the output of any commands available on your Linux server. During installation, Trafikito agent tries to detect basic available…
markdownRemark.html: At Trafikito you can monitor the output of any commands available on your Linux server. During installation, Trafikito agent tries to detect basic available commands and generate an initial dashboard for you automatically. Then, you can make desired changes to the default dashboard as it is very flexible.
